scenes.description: Dialogue section between Ninomae Ina'nis and Hakos Baelz after their skit.
Performance of the song 'The Hero' (English Version of 'Yuusha').

subtitles.original: Save the rat!
subtitles.english: Save the rat!

subtitles.original: I don't know if you guys saw, but there was an evil dragon and he was like...
subtitles.english: I don't know if you guys saw, but there was an evil dragon and he was like...

subtitles.original: SAVE THE RAT!
subtitles.english: SAVE THE RAT!

subtitles.original: Yeah! How dare they.
subtitles.english: Yeah! How dare they.

subtitles.original: Are you okay? Are you okay? All good, all good, thank you, thank you.
subtitles.english: Are you okay? Are you okay? All good, all good, thank you, thank you.

subtitles.original: Yeah. Now that you're all well, you might as well say the thing.
subtitles.english: Yeah. Now that you're all well, you might as well say the thing.

subtitles.original: Eh? Say the thing?
subtitles.english: Eh? Say the thing?

subtitles.original: You know, the thing. The thing.
subtitles.english: You know, the thing. The thing.

subtitles.original: What thing?
subtitles.english: What thing?

subtitles.original: You know... Like today is a special day?
subtitles.english: You know... Like today is a special day?

subtitles.original: Oh! Yeah! Today is... Today is the day...
subtitles.english: Oh! Yeah! Today is... Today is the day...

subtitles.original: ...that the princess has been saved! Thank you very much! Thank you!
subtitles.english: ...that the princess has been saved! Thank you very much! Thank you!

subtitles.original: 拍手、拍手、はい！ あざます、あざます！ はい、はい、あざます！
subtitles.english: Clap, clap, yes! Thanks a lot, thanks a lot! Yes, yes, thanks a lot!

subtitles.original: No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no!
subtitles.english: No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no!

subtitles.original: Bae! What day is when this purple one become to be? Purple-born-day-day?
subtitles.english: Bae! What day is when this purple one become to be? Purple-born-day-day?

subtitles.original: Oh! I see! You're looking for that one! Yeah, yeah, okay, okay, okay!
subtitles.english: Oh! I see! You're looking for that one! Yeah, yeah, okay, okay, okay!

subtitles.original: INA-CHAN, HAPPY BIRTHDAY!
subtitles.english: INA-CHAN, HAPPY BIRTHDAY!

subtitles.original: Yay! Thanks for joining me today, Bae!
subtitles.english: Yay! Thanks for joining me today, Bae!

subtitles.original: Thanks for inviting me!
subtitles.english: Thanks for inviting me!

subtitles.original: I was so happy! It was so fun, so fun!
subtitles.english: I was so happy! It was so fun, so fun!

subtitles.original: Oh yeah, it was so fun to dance with you and sing with you. It's the best! It's the best!
subtitles.english: Oh yeah, it was so fun to dance with you and sing with you. It's the best! It's the best!

subtitles.original: Yes! I just wanted to say, Ina, your new outfit is so cute!
subtitles.english: Yes! I just wanted to say, Ina, your new outfit is so cute!

subtitles.original: Thank you! You like it? It's so cute! Oh my god!
subtitles.english: Thank you! You like it? It's so cute! Oh my god!

subtitles.original: It's called... What's the outfit called?
subtitles.english: It's called... What's the outfit called?

subtitles.original: 勇者！
subtitles.english: The Hero!

subtitles.original: Yuusha Ina! Oh!
subtitles.english: Yuusha Ina! Oh!

subtitles.original: That's right! I look like a hero, right?
subtitles.english: That's right! I look like a hero, right?

subtitles.original: You do look like a hero! My hero!
subtitles.english: You do look like a hero! My hero!

subtitles.original: Ooh! Ah, Bae!
subtitles.english: Ooh! Ah, Bae!

subtitles.original: And Mr. Squeaks, thanks for leading me to Bae!
subtitles.english: And Mr. Squeaks, thanks for leading me to Bae!

subtitles.original: Thanks man! You did great! High five! High five!
subtitles.english: Thanks man! You did great! High five! High five!

subtitles.original: Man, if it wasn't for him, I'd be stuck as a statue forever.
subtitles.english: Man, if it wasn't for him, I'd be stuck as a statue forever.

subtitles.original: Don't shake your head too much, he's gonna fly off!
subtitles.english: Don't shake your head too much, he's gonna fly off!

subtitles.original: He's used to it! We're just like... Oh no! There we go. He's all good.
subtitles.english: He's used to it! We're just like... Oh no! There we go. He's all good.

subtitles.original: Oh yeah, thank you Bae for joining, it was so fun!
subtitles.english: Oh yeah, thank you Bae for joining, it was so fun!

subtitles.original: Thank you for saving me!
subtitles.english: Thank you for saving me!

subtitles.original: Well, I think... Are you still going on a journey? Continuing your journey after this?
subtitles.english: Well, I think... Are you still going on a journey? Continuing your journey after this?

subtitles.original: I am a hero, after all! I gotta go see all the princesses I gotta save in the world!
subtitles.english: I am a hero, after all! I gotta go see all the princesses I gotta save in the world!

subtitles.original: Excuse me? Huh? It wasn't just me?
subtitles.english: Excuse me? Huh? It wasn't just me?

subtitles.original: Alright, let's go! Happy Birthday!
subtitles.english: Alright, let's go! Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: Well, that's that.
subtitles.english: Well, that's that.

subtitles.original: On to the next princess! Let's go!
subtitles.english: On to the next princess! Let's go!

subtitles.original: Many days, intense and fairytale-like scenes, pulverized at the end we have seen
subtitles.english: Many days, intense and fairytale-like scenes, pulverized at the end we have seen

subtitles.original: A curtain to fall much too soon, to a world such as this
subtitles.english: A curtain to fall much too soon, to a world such as this

subtitles.original: Still voices taking place right on this field, shadows of many vestiges they aim for
subtitles.english: Still voices taking place right on this field, shadows of many vestiges they aim for

subtitles.original: There was a hero who took it all for us, a little journey of memories with you
subtitles.english: There was a hero who took it all for us, a little journey of memories with you

subtitles.original: 勇者
subtitles.english: The Hero

subtitles.original: Lyrics, Music: Ayase
subtitles.english: Lyrics, Music: Ayase

subtitles.original: No more pages left in that story, our hero goes into slumber deep
subtitles.english: No more pages left in that story, our hero goes into slumber deep

subtitles.original: Leaving behind a veil of peace for all, saving the world for us all
subtitles.english: Leaving behind a veil of peace for all, saving the world for us all

subtitles.original: The flow of time erases without mercy, any rows of memories and you
subtitles.english: The flow of time erases without mercy, any rows of memories and you

subtitles.original: Even the traces left in life for now, rustling in time as you said
subtitles.english: Even the traces left in life for now, rustling in time as you said

subtitles.original: And yet I'll keep all your hopes, all the words and wishes, courage you won
subtitles.english: And yet I'll keep all your hopes, all the words and wishes, courage you won

subtitles.original: Still dwell inside me and even now in my heart, keep living through
subtitles.english: Still dwell inside me and even now in my heart, keep living through

subtitles.original: Odd as it is we share the same path and nothing more to pass, so it should have been
subtitles.english: Odd as it is we share the same path and nothing more to pass, so it should have been

subtitles.original: But suddenly I was wondering all those tears rolling down my cheeks, why do they come out and fall?
subtitles.english: But suddenly I was wondering all those tears rolling down my cheeks, why do they come out and fall?

subtitles.original: For I want to find out until we reach right now, if I engage in the journey we went on about again
subtitles.english: For I want to find out until we reach right now, if I engage in the journey we went on about again

subtitles.original: Though I am no longer walking next to you, one day I know I'll find the truth
subtitles.english: Though I am no longer walking next to you, one day I know I'll find the truth

subtitles.original: Another story unfolds into a journey that alone I set out to
subtitles.english: Another story unfolds into a journey that alone I set out to

subtitles.original: I meet the locals of every town I stop in, they are all recalling the person that you were
subtitles.english: I meet the locals of every town I stop in, they are all recalling the person that you were

subtitles.original: Unwavering kindness is something of you, a thing occurring in everything you do
subtitles.english: Unwavering kindness is something of you, a thing occurring in everything you do

subtitles.original: Here and there we can find scattered symbols around, manifesting that all we will prove this
subtitles.english: Here and there we can find scattered symbols around, manifesting that all we will prove this

subtitles.original: And even back what they mean so one day, I wouldn't find myself alone becoming lonely
subtitles.english: And even back what they mean so one day, I wouldn't find myself alone becoming lonely

subtitles.original: And I call to mind every moment of our journey, when I see the signs left in these scenes
subtitles.english: And I call to mind every moment of our journey, when I see the signs left in these scenes

subtitles.original: Many days, intense and fairytale-like scenes, pulverized at the end we have seen
subtitles.english: Many days, intense and fairytale-like scenes, pulverized at the end we have seen

subtitles.original: It was that moment our paths caught meeting, changed 1% of the journey that was me
subtitles.english: It was that moment our paths caught meeting, changed 1% of the journey that was me

subtitles.original: Even if your courageous steps go into the distance, and for the sake of what everybody can recall
subtitles.english: Even if your courageous steps go into the distance, and for the sake of what everybody can recall

subtitles.original: I will bring you along with me into the future shining, taking your hand in mine
subtitles.english: I will bring you along with me into the future shining, taking your hand in mine

subtitles.original: And know it all began right at that time, mundane and everyday signs, the moment ignited
subtitles.english: And know it all began right at that time, mundane and everyday signs, the moment ignited

subtitles.original: And now that you remain, my reflections of those times go on as brightly shining
subtitles.english: And now that you remain, my reflections of those times go on as brightly shining

subtitles.original: In these scenes I want to find out until we reach right now, looking back at you standing so proud
subtitles.english: In these scenes I want to find out until we reach right now, looking back at you standing so proud
